quest.name: The Threat of Perplexity
journal: Guildmaster Cocobuki wishes you to learn from the next chapter of Thaumaturgy: The Yawning Abyss.
Listen to Cocoboha, the second-youngest brother, as he instructs you from the chapter entitled “The Threat of Perplexity.”

You learn of a recent spate of murders perpetrated by a villain known only as the “Mageslayer.” The killer appears to be exclusively targeting thaumaturges, draining them of their aetheric vitality. Head to Nophica's Wells in western Thanalan, and aid Cocobusi in his attempt to track down this seemingly insatiable predator.
Cocobusi has bid you examine the remains of the slain thaumaturges. Head into the nearby stream, and see what evidence of the killer can be found.
You have recovered a bloody scepter, a shredded tome, and a bloody bracelet from the corpses of the unfortunate mages. Return to Cocobusi, and see what he can determine from the sullied objects.

After noting the freshness of the blood staining the items you recovered, Cocobusi believes the killer may yet be lurking nearby. Head back into the stream, and draw out the Mageslayer by using yourself as bait. You nervously hope that the Roegadyn warrior does, indeed, stand ready to leap into the fray!
With the help of the stalwart swordsman, you have succeeded in defeating the trio of imps. Report your success to Cocobusi.

Cocobusi laments that a single imp managed to escape the scene of slaughter. Search for the cowardly voidsent in the shaded outcropping to the southeast, and bring your trial to a satisfying conclusion.
The true identity of the Mageslayer has been revealed. Return to the Thaumaturges' Guild and report to Cocoboha.

Cocoboha, seemingly unaware of his younger sibling's possession, declares that with the successful completion of this lesson's trial, your training with the Yawning Abyss is now at an end. Speak with Cocobuki, and learn what is to be done about Cocobusi.

Cocobuki appears shaken and dismayed by his confrontation with the voidsent-possessed Cocobusi. He asks that you leave him in peace for a time, that he might consider his next course of action.

※The next thaumaturge quest will be available from Cocobygo upon reaching level 25.
objectives: Speak with Cocobusi in Nophica's Wells.
Gather evidence from the thaumaturges' corpses.
Report to Cocoboha at the Thaumaturges' Guild.
Defeat the soulsucker imp and its minions!

dialogue.name: SCENE00019
dialogue.text:
Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“The Threat of Perplexity”?

dialogue.name: SCENE00019
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: SCENE00019
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Forename, you're safe! I feared you had fallen victim to the “Mageslayer”! Have you not heard of the recent spate of gruesome killings taking place within Ul'dah?

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Each case involves at least one dead thaumaturge, and every corpse is found bloody, battered, and utterly drained of aetheric energy.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Ill tidings aside, I am glad to see you alive and glowing with vitality─it is time for you to delve into the final chapter of the Yawning Abyss. Cocoboha, our second-youngest sibling, will read to you from “The Threat of Perplexity.”

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text: Bwahaha! Greetings, Forename! Are you once more prepared to peruse the pages of power and peril? Then let us begin.

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text:
“The Threat of Perplexity.
Ah, how magnificent the daunting power we wield. Flames pursue, ice transfixes, and lightning dances into the ranks of our enemies.

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text: “But what terror descends when, from all sides, those ranks close? Flames are smothered, ice crushed, and lightning grounded. Know you this threat, and ware you the multitudinous foe.”

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text: Is the point of this passage readily apparent? It would be most problematic, for example, should you meet this malefic Mageslayer and he─or she─proves to be multiple murderers.

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text: What a thaumaturge needs is a thickset thrall...er, courageous companion to accompany herhim in cases where collective cronies are expected. Now, as for your trial─

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: Cocoboha! Pray allow me to suggest a PRACTICAL course for Forename's training!

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: The town is buzzing with the news of yet more SLAUGHTERED thaumaturges, their mutilated bodies found fouling the waters of Nophica's Wells. I would have Forename aid me in hunting down the culprit while the trail is yet FRESH!

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text: Forename may have tolerated your interruption of herhis trial the last time, Busi, but you are hardly the hardy henchman shehe needs to clear such a hazardous hurdle.

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: Your concerns are understandable, brother. If it would allay your FEARS, I can introduce Forename to a valiant warrior who recently entered my employ.

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text: You have secured the services of a stalwart swordsman? Then, that would, indeed, be in line with learning the lesson of the day. Perhaps─

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: Come now, Forename! Let us be about our business before Cocoboha has a change of HEART. I'll be waiting for you in Nophica's Wells!

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Was that...Cocobusi?

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename, so GOOD of you to come! My Roegadyn friend here is the warrior I mentioned back at the Ossuary.

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: Now, there's no time to waste! Why don't you head into the stream and examine the bodies of the slain mages? I would go with you, but with my DELICATE stomach, I fear I might...contaminate the scene. Remember: you're looking for anything that might help us track down this killer.

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: You'll find the bloodied CORPSES over in the running stream east of here. Examine the remains, and see what clues you can find!

dialogue.name: GLADIATOR
dialogue.text: The Lalafell promised me a sack full o' gil to do what I do best─an' that's keepin' all the attention on me. Hah!

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: Did you uncover anything...incriminating?

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: Hee hee! The blood is yet slick to the touch. The SLAUGHTER must have been recent indeed.

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: The villain may yet lurk nearby! Return to the creek where the bodies lay and linger for a time. I daresay your aura, saturated as it is with ENTICING aetheric energy, will lure the Mageslayer into the open. Have courage, Forename─our burly companion stands ready to leap to your aid!

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: Back to the stream, Forename! Wait by the place where you found the bodies. Your ALLURING aura may serve to draw out this insatiable Mageslayer.

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: It seems your partnership with our hired blade went splendidly! It is unfortunate, though, that one of the imps was able to FLUTTER away... Oh? Did you not notice?

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: You wouldn't wish to report to Cocoboha with your trial but half-finished, would you? Of course not. I'm AFRAID, however, that the Roegadyn has already collected his recompense and departed for the nearest alehouse. What to do, what to do?

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: Hmmm. Surely, a thaumaturge of your CALIBER can handle a single imp, yes? If I'm not mistaken, it fled into that little cave over there. Hurry now, before it slips away into some hidden nook or cranny!

dialogue.name: COCOBUSI
dialogue.text: The imp must be hiding inside that little cave. If you HURRY, you may catch it before it escapes you entirely!

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: That is not Cocobusi. Well, it is Cocobusi...but a Cocobusi possessed by the voidsent that escaped from Mormo's urn! It was feeding on the aetheric energy of all those slain thaumaturges.

dialogue.name: SUCCUBUS
dialogue.text: Hee hee hee! And you, my dear, mana-rich Forename, were to be NEXT! I have wanted to absorb YOUR delicious power since the moment we met.

dialogue.name: SUCCUBUS
dialogue.text: A pity. This has been such an AMUSING charade. How ever did you see through it?

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Hm hm hm. I am Cocobusi's brother. How could I not? It is time I destroyed you, Mormo, and put a stop to these sinister killings. As the eldest, I must take responsibility for my family's misadventures.

dialogue.name: SUCCUBUS
dialogue.text: Hee hee. A coward like YOU? Destroy ME? Your opening strike should have pierced my heart, but instead, you aimed for the KNIFE.

dialogue.name: SUCCUBUS
dialogue.text: Fear stays your hand─fear that slaying me will ALSO slay your sibling!

dialogue.name: SUCCUBUS
dialogue.text: Hee hee! Poor, spineless thaumaturge. I shall, however, leave you with a pleasant thought: it was Cocobusi's FERVENT wish to amass this power!

dialogue.name: SUCCUBUS
dialogue.text: He CRAVED the arcane strength to stand beside his brothers as an equal. What a shame that he must now stand AGAINST you! Hee hee hee!

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: It pains me to admit, but there is some truth to that creature's words. I surrendered the perfect opportunity to end this. I have betrayed my own teachings...

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: Return to the Ossuary and report the completion of your trial, Forename. I will remain here for a time and...gather my thoughts.

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename! Cocobuki has advised me of your adventures. It seems the Mageslayer slithered away, but your stint with the swordsman was nonetheless successful!

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text: Consider this chapter complete; your time with our tome of teachings is at an end!

dialogue.name: COCOBOHA
dialogue.text: Ahem. Well, to be absolutely accurate, there is an addendum with additional advice, but Cocobuki considers it “extracurricular.” Even I dare not delve into those diabolical depths─I do not yet deign to die, you understand!

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: I have yet to inform my brothers of Cocobusi's misfortune; I have yet to reconcile the maelstrom within my own mind.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: The most fundamental lessons of thaumaturgy demanded I slay the creature where it stood. It was the most opportune moment to strike─minimal risk, and victory all but assured. How many more will suffer for my hesitation...and my cowardice?

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: It will likely be some time, however, before Mormo resurfaces to kill again. Now that we have uncovered the deception, the voidsent will seek a new hunting ground where Cocobusi's face is unknown.

dialogue.name: COCOBUKI
dialogue.text: And though the respite may be brief, I must devote this time to considering my next course of action. Pray leave me to my musings, Forename.

dialogue.name: FRIEND
dialogue.text: Aha! The demon shows its claws!

dialogue.name: FRIEND
dialogue.text:
I'll keep it busy.
You just focus on magickin'!

dialogue.name: FRIEND
dialogue.text:
This bastard's got some nasty spells!
Stay well back, you hear!?

dialogue.name: FRIEND
dialogue.text:
Put the big bugger to sleep!
I can't take three at once!

dialogue.name: FRIEND
dialogue.text:
That takes care o' that!
I'm off to collect me coin!
